page.title: 09Clothes
page.content: Nowadays some people wear untidy clothes like skin tight jeans with belts hanging from them. Punks usually have bright coloured hair with spikes. Other people wear nice and fashionable clothes which are ordinary. In South Molton today there are 7 clothes shops.Most people today buy their clothes in South Molton or go to Barnstaple or Exeter. We found some photographs of some people in this area many years ago. Ladies wore long dresses. They only had one or two sets of working clothes and one set of best clothes. They mostly wore hats or scarves. On their feet they wore ankle boots. Men wore flares and caps. They only had one or two sets of working clothes and one set of best clothes.
